News

DSL's target of achieving $250 million in RMG exports by 2030.

Dongyi Sourcing Limited, one of the prominent sourcing giants in Bangladesh, has set an ambitious target of achieving $250 million in readymade garment (RMG) exports by 2030. With a strong market presence and expertise in the industry, the company is poised to make significant strides toward this goal. Driven by...

Dongyi Sourcing Ltd awarded to their business partners Bangladesh-based one of the largest multinational apparel sourcing hubs, Dongyi Sourcing Ltd. celebrates its 3rd Anniversary on 13 January at Le Meridien hotel in the capital. We’re excited to share highlights from our recent training session on the upgraded version of the ERP's Inspection Module with the DSL QA team. This training empowers our team to conduct accurate inspections, elevating our quality control standards and ensuring that our products consistently meet the highest benchmarks.

By mastering this tool, we are committed to achieving greater customer satisfaction! ... See MoreSee Less

✨ Exciting News! ✨

We are thrilled to announce that Mr. Adam Ali Shanto has been promoted to Head of Department (HOD) - Quality Assurance and G.H. M. Ahosan Habib has been promoted to Assistant Manager – Garment Technical!

Congratulations to both for their well-deserved achievements. Your hard work and dedication continue to inspire us all. Wishing you both great success in your new roles! 🎉👏

Dongyi Sourcing Limited
2 weeks ago

🚨 Job Opportunity: Junior IT Executive 🚨
Vacancy: 01
Location: Dhaka (Uttara), Bangladesh

We are looking for a proactive Junior IT Executive to join our team! If you're passionate about IT, enjoy solving hardware and software issues, and want to grow in the field, this is for you!

Key Responsibilities:

Provide 1st level IT support for hardware, software & network issues
Assist with computer setup, troubleshooting & user accounts management
Maintain systems, backups & security
Requirements:

Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
Fresh graduates welcome! IT support experience is a plus
Knowledge of Windows/Linux, networking & troubleshooting
Benefits:

Yearly salary review, 2 festival bonuses & performance bonus
Health, medical, and life insurance
Long-term benefits & provident fund

Application Deadline: 20/10/2024

📧 Drop your CV: career@dongyi.hk
For more info: www.dongyi.hk

Join us and be part of our growing IT team! 🌟

#JobOpportunity #ITJobs #JuniorIT #Hiring #DhakaJobs #ITCareer ... See MoreSee Less

Dongyi Sourcing Limited
4 weeks ago

We are excited to announce that Roozbeh Ghanadi has joined us as the Print & Graphic Designer in our Womenswear team.

Roozbeh brings over a decade of industry experience and a wealth of knowledge in creating dynamic, trend-focused designs. He has worked with prominent brands such as Marks & Spencer in London and Collection 18 in New York City. Throughout his career, Roozbeh has developed a unique ability to craft high-quality, original prints, from hand-drawn artworks to digital designs, aligning them with brand identity and customer preferences. His key skills include Adobe Creative Suite, Procreate, screen printing, digital printing, and embellishment design. He has a deep understanding of colour separation, trend research, and working closely with suppliers to ensure that designs meet deadlines and quality standards.

We’re delighted to have Roozbeh on board, and we’re confident that his experience and creativity will be a great asset to our team.

Please join us in welcoming Roozbeh Ghanadi to the DSL UK Family ! ... See MoreSee Less

On behalf of PH Foundation, financial assistance of 100,000 Taka was provided to the family of the deceased student. The money was handed over to the family by Md. Selim and Md. Nijam.
